δ: Embeds propositions as Boxes in semantic/graph geometry; logic operates on their projected Θ-values.
Φ\_logic: Projection from full semantic state to 1D logic polarity axis Θ.
Θ: Polarity field (Θ\_+, Θ\_-) on which gate algebra is defined (min, max, negation, product).
Π: Truth evaluator; threshold map from Θ to {0,1}.
Σ: Used for aggregating Θ over families of propositions (e.g., FORALL / EXISTS variants via Θ\_min / Θ\_max).
